<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><br></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#E36C09">1.</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#E36C09">创新</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">如果我让你说几个需要创新的职业，你可能会说作家、音乐家和画家。但是很少有人知道软件开发工作也非常需要创造性。这几乎就是毫无疑问的，因为我们需要自己创造以前并不存在的各种功能。而且解决方案在结构和细节上也是千变万化。</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#00B0F0">所以经常需要权衡得到一个最佳的方案。而这些都需要创新。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#E36C09">2.</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#E36C09">协作</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#00B0F0">很多人认为程序员就是呆坐在电脑前整天写代码的独行侠。</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">但是，很遗憾，这些人想错了，软件开发事实上需要整个团队的共同努力。我们需要和同事讨论编程问题和解决方案，还要和产品经理、测试人员和客户讨论需求和其他问题等。而且现在结对编程（两个开发人员在同一台电脑上一起编程）也非常受欢迎。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#E36C09">3.</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#E36C09">人才需求大</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">越来越多的人在使用软件，就像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">Marc Andreessen</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">所说的，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">软件正在吞噬世界。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;
color:#3E3E3E">即使现在有越来越多的年轻程序员加入进来，但还是供不应求。</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#00B0F0">经常有软件公司抱怨说招不到好的开发人员。貌似没有多少行业像这一行这样渴求人才。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#E36C09">4.</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#E36C09">薪资优渥</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#00B0F0">软件开发能创造很多价值。</span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
